name: Atomic Pool
description:
Atomic Pool Warning!

The reactor is malfunctioning! There is no hope for you to leave ... but for how long will you be able to maintain the core stable-ish to allow others you flee the area?

Controls

As written in the documentation:

  • Left/Right arrows or A/D to move the canon
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click or mouse wheel to switch particle
